name: echobrain-ai-powered-second-brain
description: EchoBrain - AI Powered Second Brain with MERN Stack

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:full --prefix backend
scripts.build:full: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:all --prefix backend && rm -rf frontend/dist
scripts.verify:structure: echo "Verifying project structure..." && ls -la backend/ && echo "Backend dist contents:" && ls -la backend/dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo "No dist folder found" && echo "Verification complete."

author: Saksham Singh Rathore
